semantic_identifier: [GOLD-75]: Detect and flag manually pasted positioning blocks that are stale vs Customer_Analyzer
title: Detect and flag manually pasted positioning blocks that are stale vs Customer_Analyzer

sections.text: Add a comparison step when a user pastes/edits a positioning block to detect mismatch with the latest Customer_Analyzer block for the same account/opportunity. If the pasted content is stale, surface a non-blocking warning and offer a one-click “Replace with latest from Customer_Analyzer” action. Log an event with account/opportunity ID, detected version/timestamp, and user action (kept vs replaced) to support follow-on fixes.
